body.name: 3 Channel Dash Cam Front and Rear Inside, 1080p 4 Inches 170° Wide Angle Dashcam, Dash Camera for Cars with 32GB Card, Super Night Vision, Loop Recording, G-Sensor, Motion Detection, Parking Mode

features: 🚕【Three Channel Front Inside Rear Dash Cam】The CHENSIVE is a triple channel dash cam that offers a 170° front camera, 120° inside the camera, and 140° rear camera. It can monitor the front, rear, and interior of the vehicle and different screen viewing modes can be selected, providing 1080P video at the same time Wekiodum

🚕【Car Camera with 32G SD Card】4-inch IPS screen car camera with 32GB SD card (has already been inserted into the dash cam), can work infinitely with a loop recording function. 👉Don't worry that this dash cam will be full of storage space! This driving recorder can simultaneously work with the front camera + the car camera, or the front camera + the rear camera. Provide you with multi-view modes Wekiodum

🚕【Hidden Design and Easy Installation Dash Camera 】Unique compact 3 channel dash cam. CHENSIVE dash cams combine three cameras in a compact size, it doesn't block your view or distract you while driving. And you can adjust the angle of the front camera to fit your window. The rear camera is easy to install, the reversing light does not need to be disassembled, and it can be used after connecting with the front lens Wekiodum

🚕【Dash Camera for Cars】Loop recording overwrites the oldest footage with the newest upon filling a card but will skip the emergency locked video (locked files will not be overwritten). When the built-in G-sensor detects a sudden shake/collision, the current video will automatically lock to prevent it from being overwritten. Accident scenes can be truly restored. This dash camera supports micro SD cards up to 32GB (32GB memory card included, no separate purchase required Wekiodum

🚕【Dash Cam Front and Rear with Super Night Vision】This dash camera with night vision front and rear simultaneously recording with super high-resolution 1920X1080P FHD 30fps lens, delivers clearer videos & 12MP images. For the f/2.0 big aperture & WDR (wide dynamic range) technology, the CHENSIVE car camera performs well in color precision and clarity whether day or night Wekiodum

🚕【Dash Cam】When the dashboard camera detects a collision, it will automatically turn on and then record a protected video. The collision detection or buffer motion sensor can be triggered by impact or movement if your vehicle crashes while parked, or if someone tries to steal your vehicle. 24-hour recording, this dash cam will provide a 24-hour parking monitor for your car, providing 24-hour recording (requires connection of hardwire kit, soldseparately) Wekiodum

🚕【After-sales Service】CHENSIVE driving recorder meets any needs of consumers, We provide 7*24 technical support-respond within 12 hours.You can Email our customer care and we will answer any of your questions and resolve arising issues fastly Wekiodum
body.description: 3 Channel Dash Cam Front and Rear Inside Take You into Safe Driving -The 32G Free SD card is included in the package (it has already been inserted into the dash cam card slot), not need the extra purchase. -Dash cam supports 24-hour recording only when it's connected to a USB hardwire kit (not included in the package). Please purchase it on amazon.com and join the hardwire kit to your fuse box. -To ensure seamless recording, please turn off the "Motion Detection" and "Park Mode" functions when driving. 32G MicroSD Card Included (Installed) 4-inch Screen with 1080P Seamless Loop recording & Motion detection WDR technology & 24Hours Parking monitor Super Night Vision & G-Sensor

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The CHENSIVE Newest 3 Channel Dash Cam Constant Protection for Driving! CHENSIVE More Reliable Dash camera: Stable performance for more advanced processor, more powerful sensor, longer useful life than other car cameras. Quick Responsive - We are responsible for every customer, If you have any questions about our camera for car recording, please let us know, and we will help you asap. Packaging - Our package has high quality, and convenient for storage. It's also a good choice for a gift. NOTE: A memory card is included in the packaging, and the SD card has already been inserted into the dash cam card slot. Max Support 32GB Micro SD Card. ✔ We Recommend a Class 10, U3 Speed Micro-SD Memory Card for 3 CHANNEL Video If You Want to Use an Extra SD Card.

Excellent wide-angle design lens for clear images Adopt the all-glass plus IR filter lens, high sensitivity sensor, and noise reduction processor to promote image processing ability for a brighter and clearer image. Innovative image processing reduces the system load to ensure the most fluent high-definition video.

Why Choose CHENSIVE? CHENSIVE is customer focus. We hope that our dash cam can provide extra protection for your car, getting you out of trouble when you need evidence. Safety Certified & Tested: Certified by CE, FCC, and RoHS Certificates What's in the Box? 1* Dual Dash Cam (Front & Cabin Inside) 1* Rear Camera & Extending Cable 1* Suction Mount 1* Car charger 1* User Manual 3 Channel Dash Cam Front and Rear Inside Take You into Safe Driving -The 32G Free SD card is included in the package (it has already been inserted into the dash cam card slot), not need the extra purchase. -Dash cam supports 24-hour recording only when it's connected to a USB hardwire kit (not included in the package). Please purchase it on amazon.com and join the hardwire kit to your fuse box. -To ensure seamless recording, please turn off the "Motion Detection" and "Park Mode" functions when driving. 32G MicroSD Card Included (Installed) 4-inch Screen with 1080P Seamless Loop recording & Motion detection WDR technology & 24Hours Parking monitor Super Night Vision & G-Sensor

G-sensor Emergency Lock With the built-in G-sensor, when the car encountered a collision, the present evidence video will automatically record for 30 seconds. The video will be blocked, automatically save the video, and restore the scene of the accident, to prevent misuse, deletion, or overwrite, which ensures important footage is kept secure. Three Channel Monitor - Wider Angle 3 channel dash cam front and rear inside offers a 170° wide-angle front camera, a 120° in-car camera, and a 140° rear camera. Monitoring the front, rear, and interior of the vehicle, the dash cams can provide sufficient evidence for rear-end collisions and bumps. Loop Recording Loop recording automatically overwrites the oldest videos and saves current videos to avoid memory cards getting full. Recommend regularly deleting irrelevant records, saving important information, and extending memory card space. (32GB memory card has already been inserted into the dash cam card slot), no need to buy it separately)

Easy Installation & Operation The front camera can be easily installed on the windshield. Then connect the car charger power cable to the camera and route the cable alongside the car interior trim panels. With simplified rear camera installation, no need to remove the reversing light, just connect it to the front lens and it can be used. The user manual will give detailed guidance. Rear Waterproof Camera The rear camera supports mounting on the rear window or above the number plate. The rear-mounted waterproof camera can be easily installed and hidden by wires. The rear camera is water resistant, so you don't have to worry about the rear camera mounted on the license plate being damaged by rain. Battery Life Our driving recorder provides a cigarette lighter, which can be directly connected to the power supply. Or you can install the hardwire kit (NOT included in the package) as a power cable to achieve 24-hour car protection. In normal use, make sure the dash cam is powered on. Please power it off if you do not drive your car over a week for battery safe

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like this very much
reviews.reviewText: The thing I like most about it is that it was not at all expensive. In fact it was very affordable, but it is above and beyond what I need from such a device. I can't imagine needing more quality than the image I see in this viewscreen. It comes on and goes off automatically. It stays where I put it. I just can't think of one thing negative to say about it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Clear video easy to operate ( clear instructions) set up in minutes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fairly easy install
reviews.reviewText: Fairly easy install, and pretty good video quality. Does the job for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Complete water of money and time.
reviews.reviewText: It doesn't hold a charge longer than 2 days.No matter how long it's charged, the camera shuts down after 10 minutes.I tried to contact the company for a refund, but my emails and phone messages were never returned.Don't Waste your hard earned money on this crappy dash cam.I'll never use this brand camera again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: For this price its good if u want higher quality i wouldnt recommend this one. Main reason i got was to use it for my older model suv for the rear view when hooking up my trailer. Works good for what i intended to use it for

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as intended
reviews.reviewText: Good product, does what it's supposed to do. Surprisingly clear for cheap. It could use a little more strength on the plastic rotating part as the device gets loose quick with a slight tap from the windshield visors. overall a very good product at a fraction of a cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: As we live in Florida with lots of older drivers and we had just bought a new car we felt having a dash camera would be helpful. Cost was also a factor. This camera is a great value, the picture is good, and was easy to install. Hope fully there will be a wireless or Bluetooth version in the future. While the picture is good at times in bright sunlight it is difficult to see from the driver's seat although it is probably where we have mounted the camera more than the camera itself. I would recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Good while it lasted
reviews.reviewText: Product worked great for a few months but died the day after the return window closed. No longer powers on, made sure to Check all fuses and wiring but they are fine. Very disappointing.
